reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2015
reviews.people_found_useful_num: 41 people found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review: \n  My cats LOVE their new house.  Assembly was very easy, it took me around 40 minutes from start to finish.  However, I thought the fake plant leaves looked a little cheesy so I didn\'t bother adding them. I highly recommend this cat house!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHNTAX2BZZY6G6GE6OSSPPLQPHEQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2015
reviews.people_found_useful_num: 2 people found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review_title: Very sturdy and aesthetic tree stand.
reviews.review: \n  It took a few weeks for my cats to accept this tree as their own, but after rubbing in plenty of catnip... well, my biggest one (20# large fluffy mutt cat) loves the basket. The toy has broken off, but I\'m not worried about that. It has held up quite well and is very nice looking. Some of the leaves have been chewed off by the cats, but most are still there. I vacuum it off every other time I vacuum so it stays looking nice. It is still very sturdy, and it has been pushed around a lot to vacuum carpet underneath the stand. (I bought a year ago)\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHIKOU2OBIQE7W5DHFK3N6TY6K3Q
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2016
reviews.review: \n  This cat tree is great for us.  For kitty, it is tall enough to get high above all the dog and human action, it is covered in a nice, soft short fur-type fabric, and it has a lot of different spaces.  For pet parents, it was fairly easy to assemble and took less than an hour, it is compact enough to fit into a corner of the house, and the price is pretty good compared to some others.  When assembled, it looks just like the photo, but we didn\'t receive as many vines with ours.  Not a big deal, we can buy some at a local store if we want more or the ones we received end up getting a little torn.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFIHNNTG6W6ILBT7YFYETCJ5ELPQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2015
reviews.people_found_useful_num: One person found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review_title: Fantastic size for the apartment I live in
reviews.review: \n  Fantastic size for the apartment I live in.  Goes together fairly simply and even lends itself to some modification in layout.  I didn\'t want to have it the full height so I used the wrench screw instead of the double ended screw and it fits together snugly.  Now to wait for them to find the tree more fascinating than the plastic bag it came in. Typical cat...\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFQLPJU4JLMFS57XREL5GBKGDUDA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2016
reviews.people_found_useful_num: 2 people found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review_title: I was super excited about this cat tree when I ordered it
reviews.review: \n  I was super excited about this cat tree when I ordered it. I received it in the mail and immediately went to put it together, unfortunately, the base of the cat tree was out of alignment so there was no way for me to put the tree together. While I was frustrated I had my friend try to put it together with no luck. I will be returning this product and using the other cat tree I ordered for the time being.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHXG4LKX2DPJSSBYQGB7WD3YRC7A
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2016
reviews.review: \n  Were going to have to order more of the little hammocks as they love them and the company that makes this item can and will do that too!. Easy to put together, all parts were included along with an Allan wrench. I\'d post a pic to show that my trio love their new tree! Great buy and gotta love prime shipping for this!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFOYYG545IOOGSSCMRTNK6MISVZQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2015
reviews.people_found_useful_num: 5 people found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review: \n  This is a very well manufactured item. It is very solid and sturdy. Took about 20 minutes to put together. My cat loves it and instantly made it his new home. I didn\'t bother with the vines because I know where they would end up. I definitely recommend this for anyone who\'s looking for a good product at a good price and free 2 day shipping with prime.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFRPMILWRIDZLSSG75FHGS6AE2DQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2019
reviews.review: \n  My 2 cats seem to like this pretty well. They don’t go on it a lot yet but hoping  they will. It does wobble a bit which I don’t love but otherwise a nice cat tree\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AECNEEWGIDQSBZZQRKKWGOYWE5KQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2019
reviews.review: \n  Assembly is super easy and the construction is very sturdy!  I would absolutely recommend Go Pet Club...we\'ve bought 3 of them; one for myself, one for my daughter and one for my mom.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEVOCPGIP4TH477SEG5AAE6CET2Q
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2017
reviews.review_title: Initially it was great looking and easy to put together
reviews.review: \n  This review is late but perhaps more helpful because of that. Initially it was great looking and easy to put together. After a year, we have replaced rope on one pillar. That was no problem, easy to do. The box and half tunnel have loosened up over time. I hope I can tighten it all up again. Overall very pleased. Great for the price.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AG3UJQWBUNQXLXJZFUH5KIAZZH7A
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2016
reviews.people_found_useful_num: 2 people found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review_title: What a wonderful and decorative cat tree
reviews.review: \n  What a wonderful and decorative cat tree.  Its large enough to feed my cat on so the dogs don\'t get to her food as well.  She loves looking out the window on it and it makes a lovely decorative piece for the living room.  I may add different leaves and colorful flowers to it as well!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGAN7CX2YA6SWT5TK4TZFOB5C2UA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2017
reviews.people_found_useful_num: One person found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review_title: This one is sturdy and doesn’t tip at all
reviews.review: \n  I got this for my large active Bengal cat. His other one kept tipping over. This one is sturdy and doesn’t tip at all. The platforms are large enough for him to be comfortable, and it’s very tall which he really likes.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFWLGGB5EQP3GDI5MAPJ42NTKLLQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2014
reviews.review_title: Looks nice but hard to get down off of
reviews.review: \n  The condo looks nice (even comes with the green vines) but once the cats get up on to the top levels, its difficult for them to get down.  The drop from the top center to the lower center is almost a straight down drop.  They try it and then fall forward and off.  The kittens got up there once but wont go again.  Maybe when they get bigger and can handle the big jump/fall down.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEVUCYD2RFFSYW2JY7ANTOYZTFFQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2019
reviews.review: \n  Received one and it was damaged.  Received the replacement and it was damaged as well. How the item is being packed and the lower quality of the materials being used seem to be the cause of the damage.  I have owned this brand without issue in the past, so this was a very disappointing.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHMWUYFTZQV6IPGFNZAKFTXS564Q
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2015
reviews.people_found_useful_num: 9 people found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review: \n  My kitten (8mo/8 lbs) LOVES this tree. It was easy to assemble and is sturdy enough to handle all his manic jumps and climbs. The design itself is a matter of personal preference but for me I like the look and enjoy that it does not look like an eyesore. My only complaint is that I could not use the ivy decoration as several friends including a veterinarian warned me it would be unsafe if he tore it apart and chewed it (which is exactly what he tried to do). I definitely feel I got my moneys worth and would highly recommend this to any cat owner.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGZNNOUE4UA47YYY2CYIQ6FKBI5Q
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2017
reviews.people_found_useful_num: One person found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review: \n  Easy to assemble, good instructions, durable material and sturdy. Yes the ivy is included :) My kitten has had a blast trying to tear everything apart. The Velcro along the bottom edge was the first to be pulled apart. (doesn\'t hurt anything, quickly reattaches)\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEVJTALURITPKTGHMIGMP4SQQCUA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2018
reviews.review: \n  This ended up being a lovely purchase. Albeit once my 10lb kitty is on the top purch it seems a bit wobbly. Love that their food dish isn\'t on the floor anymore. Great incentive to entice my kitties to explore and climb.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEAYENF6ZKOWBQU67PK375GN5LVA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2016
reviews.people_found_useful_num: One person found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review_title: She only used the bottom half but does seem to really like it. It is well made and attractive
reviews.review: \n  Bought this for my 16 year old cat so she might use it rather than sit on our new treadmill.  Shes very small, only about 4 pounds, and elderly. She only used the bottom half but does seem to really like it. It is well made and attractive, as far as cat trees go anyway.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFEG6SE6TBNLO7FGYP7EVKXQZF3A
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2016
reviews.review: \n  Got it quicker than expected.  Looks beautiful & our kitten loves it. She\'s in her own little world at this point & refuses to leave her tree. The only problem I had with this was that the pieces were not labeled, making it a bit harder to build. Took a bit longer than expected but other than that it was worth it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGRXKK3FOOWL2GSC4K2EF2OBMJ2A
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2018
reviews.review: \n  My energetic cat looooves this condo. He’s a little too big for the room but the rest of it works perfectly for him! It also looks nicer than most in my living room. Worth the cost. One piece came broken but we made it work.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFISZVHSXUYPSVSRKQ7HWOQTLRXQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2014
reviews.people_found_useful_num: 4 people found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review_title: Skip this cat tree. Its very unstable
reviews.review:
\n I really wanted to like this cat tree but I will give you 3 reasons why i am returning it.
1. It was missing 1 part which obviously was very disappointing.
2. Its simply not big enough for a normal size cat. The only thing she fits in is the cubby hole and my cat is very petite.
3. Everything is very narrow and unstable. I didn\'t get to build it to its full height because of the missing piece but 3/4 of the way up it was very top
heavy.
There is an circular hole half way up the top that my cat fell through which seemed dangerous because when she fell she went into full on crazy cat mode and grabbed the thing with her claws and almost tipped it over. The base is 21" x 32" and this thing is i think 74" high. very top heavy.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHGKRUVTK3HMK7GLEISUVNCIC3GA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2019
reviews.review_title: No where near big enough for large cats
reviews.review: \n  Unfortunately this did not work for my large cat.  It was no where sturdy enough and the beds were too small.  I gave it to my daughter who’s cats enjoy it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGH3LJXHN2C5WFRLNMG6JHKUJKRA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2019
reviews.review: \n  Our two cats (kittens when we got this) love this tree, although they have chewed most of the leaves off, they love to run, jump, and climb up the tree. They also nap on it all the time.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AF22STKTHBBOLAOEIZEG463IRLIQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2017
reviews.people_found_useful_num: 3 people found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review: \n  Amazing car tree, sturdy and well made, Comes with the vines. It is all accessible by adult cats, unlike other trees in which some cubbies are only for kittens.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AECJLPRLHZGNXTTPRY6D62LVXJFA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2021
reviews.review: \n  Looove this. Had many cat trees in my life and this is so pretty and big and study! My kitty loves her food on it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHLBJOW3I5NHCB6LRYKQ2ZFONPEA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2019
reviews.review: \n  My cat didn’t really know what to think of the tree at first. Had to take off the plastic  decorative leaves. Smells when you first get it but that’s expected with new items. Catnip and treats allowed him to get used to it. My cat loves it now.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFY5FVCKEB2QAGAA6APOQKLRY5XQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2020
reviews.review: \n  I absolutely love this purchase ! Money well spent ! My cat love this so much ! And he is a heavy boy but this handles him well.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGE3O32VAX6DVUX5ZPSBWXHO5V4Q
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2018
reviews.review: \n  I bought this for my sister for her birthday for her cats!!!  It’s not very stable and all it needs to be more  LBS on the bottom! the directions were absolutely terrible it took over 2 1/2 hours to put it together.  I would not recommend this product to anyone!  I know there’s other cat trees out there that are easier to assemble.......  nothing at all was labeled on any of the pieces the directions or terrible!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEGJ6RWZNVVIGFQ3QAAE54OLPPJA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2015
reviews.people_found_useful_num: 6 people found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review: \n  Ordered on  Wednesday & came Friday evening with Prime 2 day shipping. Easy to put together, but time consuming only because it\'s huge. So far my cats seem to like it. We just got new furniture so I\'m hoping they will scratch at this instead. Very sturdy & worth the money. :)\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AF5EZ6HPS6UNVTWQPKWJ7LWZP52A
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2018
reviews.review: \n  This is an outstanding kitty tree, my cats have been climbing all over this since I put it together and they just love it. It\'s big enough and sturdy enough to hold all 4 of my cats running, climbing and jumping on and off of it, so I highly recommend. My only complaint would be that the install instructions were a bit hard to understand  as none of the parts were labeled. It would be a lot easier if the parts could have the letters A-F on them like the instructions specify. The only thing labeled were the bolts.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGJJ2ZPGUVBNXVGKLXWO5LZAOORQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2021
reviews.review: \n  Our cats find it so much fun to play on and it\'s pretty stable for the three of them to jump around on.  It looks nice too and not some generic rope tree.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AE2DE4QD4LBTXNPGTUBJGLIWGC7Q
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2018
reviews.review: \n  Extremely easy to put together. Soft. I was very pleased with this cat tree it\'s my second one purchased and the last one I bought was much smaller than the photo. This one is exactly as pictures and definitely worth the money.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AE5AEQH3HQPIEC2MQBSUXASY7MPA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2018
reviews.review: \n  Cats like it, directions could have been a little clearer. And scratching post should be lower. A little unstable  when 2 or more cats play on it, but all and all I would buy it again\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AG54R4GDFEAIRDF23XDAOJ35RR7Q
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2020
reviews.review: \n  This product is particle board and showed up broken.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHAX2P6FBLXQA7IJEMHWIA2PZ6TA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2018
reviews.review_title: Very pretty and kittens love their tree
reviews.review: \n  It was easy to put together and came with the tools to do that. My kittens love climbing on it and there is lots of things on it to keep them climbing and building strong muscles. They love the little hammock\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AF7N2H7GIQRM3NIQERACVDVY5O4A
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2017
reviews.people_found_useful_num: One person found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review_title: Cats totally love it. I have it set near a wall ...
reviews.review: \n  Cats totally love it. I have it set near a wall because my cats tend to be hyper and jump around a lot.  My bigger male cat can\'t fit in the basket but the smaller female curls into it nicely. Super soft material and sturdy. Totally worth it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEXSWOJNQI5RPH7R4SLA6A3CDRMA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2017
reviews.review_title: My cats (2) and my friends love this tree
reviews.review: \n  My cats (2) and my friends love this tree. I have to admit that the kitties have torn up all of the greenery, but they had a good time doing it! This is solid and has lasted a LOT of use for a year now. Very happy with the product.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGTMSSIUSOJTV7N7FHSWAGBCT6IA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2016
reviews.review_title: this is amazing. Our cat simply loves this
reviews.review: \n  this is amazing. Our cat simply loves this. It has plenty of space to crawl around on. The hole that is in the center we actually placed his food dish (our puppy was eating all his food) and it works perfectly. I would encourage anyone who has a cat to purchase this. Its well made and sturdy.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEXVBV7LFCMKIQVKFBHPNQHUM3IQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2014
reviews.review: \n  I bought this a few days ago and it finally came in! Assembling is so easy and I am not a tool belt kind of person. Its very big so make sure you have room! It seems very stable but my cat (weighing at a whooping 15-18 pounds) makes it shake when he jumps on/off it. It hasnt fallen over however so I guess it is something he will have to live with! My cat used the little cave when it wasn\'t attached but now that\'s it is apart of the condo he won\'t go in; but that might just be preference. The scratching posts are great but the only downside I have about this is the weird angles. In the picture it looks like it will stand against a wall, this isn\'t the case but fear not! you can always take a few pieces here and move it there. Great material and the colors don\'t clash with many surrounding items.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFIJ2G2ZNWGP4ROSFDXVIXXEHXXA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2015
reviews.review_title: meh, it\'s ok,  a bit wobbly
reviews.review:
\n Eh there are better cat trees for less of similar quality. this one is sort of wobbly and the carpet/fur covered posts probably wont last long I can always rewrap in twine but meh
It was fairly easy to put together and the cats don\'t hate it but if i had it to do over I would have gone with a different option.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AH45MOTR335O4H3ZYTCNSVRHDTTQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2015
reviews.people_found_useful_num: 4 people found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review_title: The bowl cutout is a nice option. However
reviews.review:
\n On the plus side it is huge and offers plenty of area to play on. The bowl cutout is a nice option.

However, the only platform that is worth sleeping on is the very top one so it doesn\'t offer much in the terms of napping variety. Also the leaves are pretty cheap looking and fall apart quickly.

The packaging was also a mess and there was some damage to the product on delivery.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFKXS4WGWGINWN5XLDHQ7XASEHYQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2017
reviews.people_found_useful_num: One person found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review: \n  Love it! It looks wonderful and the cats love it! My Maine Coon even enjoys jumping around on it at first it didn\'t seem that stable but I was pleasantly surprised to see it hold its own when he went flying off of it!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFL5JPDZGBMSRQXGK6DEATIEMW3Q
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2020
reviews.review_title: Pretty and fun for the cats.
reviews.review: \n  The cats love it. It\'s also visually very nice.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHLLEI3XEDYHZSRJN3GMU4O7H4QQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2018
reviews.review: \n  Love it! The leaves only lasted a year.. cause well.. cats.. but this thing is great! My cat just loves it and sleeps on it all day. It’s definitely her spot!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEPEY7L2NARQXRNDCEADF2YB2KEQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2020
reviews.people_found_useful_num: One person found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review: \n   It\'s perfect my cat loves it!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGQTWF6Y5CTLRMKNTRDG22KKZZNA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2020
reviews.review: \n  I\'ve had this product over a year and it\'s still holding strong. The only issue is the top most piece get\'s kind of wobbly but, it hasn\'t caused any issues.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AF4TUDRODKBDZENSABNWXU254OGQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2016
reviews.review_title: The cats absolutely love this. They play like mad cats on it ...
reviews.review: \n  The cats absolutely love this.  They play like mad cats on it and I regularly place their toys in different parts of the tree and they are always playing on it and using the scratch posts.  I like the dark color also so it blends more into the room like furniture.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHHLWUORZZANUL7ZLCUNI45MQ6AQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2016
reviews.people_found_useful_num: One person found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review: \n  This is a wonderful cat condo! It took about an hour to put together (I was goofing off with my cats during assembly) The faux fur is soft and everything looks to be made well. Instructions were simple and on point. No extra parts or weird directions that don\'t make sense. It\'s really nicely put together and looks like a nice piece of cat furniture. Love this !\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHITUVFIN6PZO4MDIM4A7GYBSPDQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2016
reviews.people_found_useful_num: One person found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review: \n  Kitty approved! They love this tree so much and are very active on it. It is holding up well with lots of play, however, the mouse was torn off by them in the first hour :/ The cats love the leaves, nooks and are stealth in surprise attacking each other :0)\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHRRU6IQHYW72QENTSH5IBQAFWBQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2019
reviews.review_title: Beautiful but not what I expected
reviews.review: \n  The tree itself look pretty good and stable but once you assemble and put everything together, it’s not as sturdy as I thought it would be. One the arch arrived broken, which I was quite upset about because this tree/tower is expensive. I just wish it would meet my expectation for a price like this. My cat doesn’t use it as much because it would always shake whenever he climbs on it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AG5TVE6HI5XBY5Q2FICUBTA636TQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2017
reviews.people_found_useful_num: One person found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review: \n  This cat tree is amazing! It is gorgeous, sturdy and easy to put together. as soon as we put the box on the floor our cat knew it was his. He loves the hammock which is one reason I chose this tree.Very impressive!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AH4FCD3OWTWQLLN7WO7Y2GKOXYMA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2019
reviews.review_title: this is a really stable tree for a large cat
reviews.review:
\n We have a really large cat 20#. She had destroyed other cat trees, simply by being heavy.
This tree has held up, and she likes it.
Assembly is simple.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEM7DIF4O72RAN3JKVDQV5CUIXPA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2018
reviews.review:
\n Easy to put together. Need 2 people -- as one must hold it.
Not easy for cats to get to top shelf -- design could be improved.
No cushioning. Just thin "fur" on top of board.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEK6OKPCC36AGCL62S7NTIP62TLA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2015
reviews.people_found_useful_num: One person found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review: \n  I was skeptical about this purchase, but I\'m very glad I decided to get it. My kitty loves it. She wouldn\'t even wait until I got it put together to start playing on it. It is very stable, and even more attractive than in the picture. It looks lovely. Also, the shipping was incredibly fast. I would\'ve had it yesterday (One day after purchasing), but my road was bad and it couldn\'t be delivered.  Definitely worth the money, plus more! I will recommend this to all of my friends! (:\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AF3JZDBOCHO34R35KI5WJXOOXV3A
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2014
reviews.review: \n  I read all the reviews before purchasing this somewhat pricey cat tree for my princess this Christmas, but it was worth it! Her present arrived early, we assembled it together with only a few slight modifications for her 13lb frame and it sits in our living room. Missy loves to race to the top, enjoys the hammocks and side perches, uses the ladder, and hides in both cubbies. While there is a slight sway to the structure when she is horsing around, I have no fear for her safety. She loves it and thinks it is one of the best Christmas presents she has ever received! Highly recommended for the purrfect pet in your life.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFJXVCEMWVDVJ33TAWZOOQODE3MA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2015
reviews.review: \n  This is such a good deal. It was easy to put together. Our car loves it. The elastic that hold the hanging mouse came off the first time the cat played with it, so I had to sew it back together. I attached another small mouse the other platform too. The design is light and airy and does not overwhelm our room.  I highly recommend this product.\n
